security: This document primarily contains biographical information and does not appear to contain sensitive information that would compromise ongoing operations, active agents, or classified methods. Therefore, there are no direct quotes to support a security assessment.
summary: This document provides biographical information for the members of the Assassination Records Review Board (ARRB), including their experience, education, and professional activities.
summary_one_paragraph: This document details the background and qualifications of the members of the Assassination Records Review Board (ARRB), established by the President John F. Kennedy Assassination Records Collection Act. It includes biographies for John R. Tunheim (Chair), Dr. Henry F. Graff, Dr. Kermit L. Hall, Dr. William L. Joyce, and Dr. Anna K. Nelson, outlining their education, professional experience, publications, and affiliations relevant to their role in reviewing and releasing records related to the assassination of President Kennedy. The biographies highlight their expertise in law, history, library science, and public policy, demonstrating their qualifications for the ARRB's mandate.
title: Assassination Records Review Board Member Biographies
